definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_nbt_text_set"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">language</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">english</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The language of the palamod has been changed to english </field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Due to the game, the langauge is has been only changed to this world, and will be reset on next lunch</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">To change for all world :</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Type Win+r  : %appdata%\.minecraft\config</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">and search for a file name Palamod _client_settings.toml</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Finally change the language variable to english or french ( only other supported language )</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
